name: 加勒特·奈夫

last_movies.title: 我为喜剧狂  第五季

introduction: 加勒特·奈夫 (Garrett Neff) 最早被大摄影师Bruce Weber发掘，出现在他多部摄影作品当中。后来加勒特·奈夫 (Garrett Neff) 被CK (Calvin Klein) 相中，成为CK最热的专属男模，加勒特·奈夫 (Garrett Neff) 的气质符合CK纯净与性感的定义。加勒特·奈夫 (Garrett Neff) 为CK拍摄的广告有07男士香水、08春季男装大片和08男士秋冬内衣等。加勒特·奈夫 (Garrett Neff) 健美的身材秘诀，是多做运动，游泳、美式足球、网球和航海，这是他推荐最好的塑身方式。加勒特·奈夫 (Garrett Neff) 最新担纲的大牌广告是罗威 (Loewe)09春夏广告。Garrett's sculpted form instantly reminds us of the iconic Calvin ads. Top photographers like Bruce Weber, Karl Lagerfeld, Mario Testino and Mert & Marcus and clients such as Louis Vuitton, Chanel, Michael Kors and Visionare already fans of this classic American beauty. He's having a moment, this one. Past campaigns: Benetton with David Sims, Lagerfeld with Karl Lagerfeld S/S08 Calvin Klein Man fragrance with Fabien Baron, CK Jeans with David Sims F/W08: Calvin Klein Man fragrance with Fabien Baron, Calvin Klein Underwear with Bruce Weber
